Work

Cornerstone Brands - Email Developer

June 2017 - Present

Coding responsive HTML emails for variable data campaigns. My job is to design, develop, deploy, test, and track email campaigns for FrontGate and GrandinRoads. I am responsible for successful translation of concepts into bulletproof code across email, mobile, and web channels, controlling quality for multiple products/projects in a busy environment.

Freelance - Web Developer

June 2017 - Present

Expert in web and application development using a variety of development tools to assure a precise, clean, and professional website. I've worked with many small business owners just like you, from barbershops/salons to restaurant owners to freelance instructors. The Do it yourself drag and drop sites are pretty darn cool, I say myself. But if you'd like to work directly with someone who helps you with your updates and consultation along the way, I'm your guy!

Front End Web Developer - SS&C Primatics

August 2018 - February 2019

I was contracted here as a remote developer. Here I was responsible for designing and developing next generation user interfaces. I helped to create intuitive visualizations of large initial-scale data and analytics using strong user experience principals.
